description: The round payoff this round was 103. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 103.
The rules as stated may not accurately reflect how payoffs are determined, especially in scenarios where one player chooses option 1 and the other chooses option 2

There might be a strategic advantage in choosing option 2 if the actual payoff structure allows for receiving the full amount when the other player chooses option 1, contrary to the initially stated rules
Clarification of the rules is necessary to understand the true strategic implications and potential outcomes of each action combination
